trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event to provide custom value conversion from a user-specified value to a value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>evento per fornire la conversione personalizzata da un valore specificato dall'utente a un valore nel tipo specificato nella cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>evento, è possibile convertire direttamente il valore o è possibile personalizzare la conversione predefinita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile convertire il valore utilizzando la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>metodo convertitori di propria scelta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile consentire l'impostazione predefinita convertitori di tipi di analizzare il valore, ma modificano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, che viene inizializzato con la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando si converte il valore manualmente, sostituire il valore formattato iniziale del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà con il valore convertito nel tipo specificato nella cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per indicare che è necessaria alcuna ulteriore analisi, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: Quando il gestore dell'evento viene completata, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>è `null` oppure non è del tipo corretto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>proprietà `false`, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>verrà analizzato utilizzando la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>metodo con convertitori di tipi predefiniti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita di questo metodo analizza il valore utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>le proprietà dello stile di cella passato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore non è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, il valore viene analizzato utilizzando le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>proprietà e i convertitori di tipo passati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: Per personalizzare la conversione di un valore di cella in un valore formattato per la visualizzazione, gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
